title: Greatest Common Divisor | Challenge
description: In mathematics, the greatest common divisor (GCD) of two or more integers, is the largest positive integer that divides each of the integers without a remainder. For example, the GCD of 8 and 12 is 4.

meta.title: Greatest Common Divisor Challenge
meta.description: Learn how to write a Python function to find the greatest common divisor of a list of integers using the functools.reduce() and math.gcd() methods.
meta.keywords: greatest common divisor, gcd, math, python, programming challenge

verify.name: Verify GCD Python Script Execution
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 最大公因数 | 挑战
i18n.description: 在数学中，两个或多个整数的最大公因数（GCD）是能够整除每个整数且没有余数的最大正整数。例如，8和12的最大公因数是4。

meta.title: 最大公因数挑战
meta.description: 学习如何编写一个Python函数，使用functools.reduce()和math.gcd()方法来找到一组整数的最大公因数。
meta.keywords: 最大公因数, GCD, 数学, Python, 编程挑战
